experience.title: L'Agent X
experience.description: During a one-week internship, I had the opportunity to interact with friendly and knowledgeable individuals and gain valuable insights into the world of advertising and marketing. Additionally, I improved my design skills and utilized Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator to create various designs.

experience.title: BetterCallDave
experience.description: I had the enriching opportunity to complete two separate three-month internships. These experiences not only diversified my skill set but also provided me with a deeper understanding of the industry and professional working environment.

experience.title: Institut Laue-Langevin
experience.description: For my first permanent position, I relocated directly to Grenoble, traveling 800 kilometers from my home, to embark on a new journey as a Full Stack Engineer. Curious about why this contract was brief? Feel free to reach out to me for the story behind it !
